name: Bhop up!
description:
A 3D platformer that will be a real challenge for those who are not afraid to try their hand at it


In Bhop UP! You have to go through several biomes, using the bunny hop mechanics, which have been somewhat refined and simplified, but still cause difficulties and increase interest, require skill and perseverance, as well as the desire to overcome difficulties.

Rise to the clouds, go through all the tests, and ultimately prove to yourself that you are unstoppable. And then, you can take on the next challenge and improve your own speed finish record in order to brag to your friends and acquaintances, colleagues, and just the entire Internet about how quickly you completed the game.
